summary: P0 Testing completed: Vehicle Import Validation (JSON parse/schema/business errors with error_code+field_errors), Vehicle Selector Engine API endpoints, Admin Categories sort_order (read-only + automatic badge). All 13 backend tests passed. Frontend UI verified for Admin Categories with SIRA column and 'Otomatik' badge.

issues: Console warnings about <span> inside <option>/<select> causing hydration errors - cosmetic React warning

passed_tests: POST /api/admin/vehicle-master-import/jobs/upload invalid JSON returns JSON_PARSE_ERROR + field_errors
POST /api/admin/vehicle-master-import/jobs/upload empty array accepted or returns schema error
POST /api/admin/vehicle-master-import/jobs/upload non-array JSON returns JSON_SCHEMA_ERROR + field_errors
POST /api/admin/vehicle-master-import/jobs/upload missing required fields returns JSON_SCHEMA_ERROR + field_errors
POST /api/admin/vehicle-master-import/jobs/upload duplicate trim key returns BUSINESS_VALIDATION_ERROR + field_errors
POST /api/admin/vehicle-master-import/jobs/upload valid JSON creates import job
GET /api/vehicle/options?year={year}&make={make}&model={model} returns fuel_types, bodies, transmissions, drives, engine_types
GET /api/vehicle/trims with optional filters (fuel_type, body, etc.) filters correctly
GET /api/admin/categories returns items with sort_order field
critical_code_review_comments: Vehicle Selector UI at /ilan-ver/arac-sec requires authentication - session handling is working correctly for protected routes

success_rate.frontend: 100% (Admin Categories UI with SIRA column and Otomatik badge verified)

context_for_next_testing_agent: P0 features fully tested: (1) Vehicle Import JSON validation returns detailed error_code (JSON_PARSE_ERROR, JSON_SCHEMA_ERROR, BUSINESS_VALIDATION_ERROR) with field_errors array, (2) Vehicle Selector Engine API provides cascading dropdowns (years->makes->models->options->trims) with filter support, (3) Admin Categories shows read-only SIRA column with 'Otomatik' badge in wizard. Vehicle selector UI at /ilan-ver/arac-sec exists but requires account portal login to access.
